participant_1.name: Laura
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and creative, Laura finds joy in crafting and baking, always looking to share her creations with others.
participant_1.background: knitting is my passion. i love to bake cookies. the county wide bake sale is where i feel most at home. i have a dogs. i am scared of dying.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Energetic and adventurous, Jake enjoys trying out new things and has a vibrant personality that draws people in.
participant_2.background: i have brown curly hair. i will graduate from high school in two years. i am a vegan. i like riding horses. my bedroom is purple and lime green.

content.text: I'm not sure, but I love cookies.
